BackstoryDef.title: vatgrown homesteader
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood in a growth vat, where [PAWN_pronoun] spent the majority of [PAWN_possessive] time in the enhanced learning 'Labor' suite.\nIn this simulation [PAWN_nameDef] experienced childhood in a tough off-grid homestead on a remote agriworld, learning by experience the skills [PAWN_pronoun] needed to survive with the land, maintain a modestly successful farm, and speak in a heavy rural accent.

BackstoryDef.title: vatgrown academic
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood in a growth vat, where [PAWN_pronoun] spent the majority of [PAWN_possessive] time in the enhanced learning 'Leader' suite.\nIn this simulation [PAWN_nameDef] experienced an enviable childhood as a pupil in a luxurious but highly competitive private academy on a decadent glitterworld, where [PAWN_pronoun] was required to compete with other students for the approval of their teachers in dramatic and stylish fashion; often with unexpected results. Throughout these lessons and trials [PAWN_nameDef] learned about the arts, economics, medicine, science and the skills required to be a leader of [PAWN_possessive] field.

BackstoryDef.title: vatgrown dreamchild
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood in a growth vat, where [PAWN_pronoun] spent the majority of their time in the enhanced learning 'Playland' suite. In the simulation [PAWN_nameDef] experienced life in a danger-free child's wonderland of colorful characters and playful adventures in 'Never Past Bedtime Land'. While [PAWN_nameDef] didn't learn many skills in this simulation, [PAWN_possessive] did experience as rich and full a childhood as any parent could dream of.
